name: ROGO
description:
ROGO is my cute rogue-lite where you gotta give everyone post and avoid cheeky animals trying to make you go to sleep

Features:
-5 Unique playable characters
-8 Procedurally generated levels
-3 Bosses
-A couple of items and other cool stuff

It's short and cool and I really hope you love it :D



Music by Keith Burgun
